description.english: Mastered the Computer skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Компьютер' (Computer). [Mastered the Computer skill.]

displayName.russian: Маленькая взрывчатка, большой урон [Small Explosive, Powerful Punch]

description.english: Mastered the Demolitions skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Оружие: Подрывное' (Weapons: Demolitions). [Mastered the Demolitions skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Environmental Training skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Тренировка на выживание' (Environmental Training). [Mastered the Environmental Training skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Lockpicking skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Взлом замков' (Lockpicking). [Mastered the Lockpicking skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Electronics skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Электроника' (Electronics). [Mastered the Electronics skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Medicine skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Медицина' (Medicine). [Mastered the Medicine skill.]

displayName.russian: Стремительный, как дельфин [Swift as a Dolphin]

description.english: Mastered the Swimming skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Плавание' (Swimming). [Mastered the Swimming skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Weapons: Heavy skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Оружие: Тяжелое' (Weapons: Heavy). [Mastered the Weapons: Heavy skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Weapons: Low Tech skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Оружие: Холодное' (Weapons: Low-Tech). [Mastered the Weapons: Low Tech skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Weapons: Pistol skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Оружие: Пистолет' (Weapons: Pistol). [Mastered the Weapons: Pistol skill.]

description.english: Mastered the Weapons: Rifle skill.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите навык 'Оружие: Винтовка' (Weapons: Rifle). [Mastered the Weapons: Rifle skill.]

description.english: Mastered three skills at once.
description.russian: Поднимите три навыка до максимального уровня. [Mastered three skills at once.]

displayName.russian: Лучший из лучших [Best of the Best]

description.english: Mastered five skills at once.
description.russian: Поднимите пять навыков до максимального уровня. [Mastered five skills at once.]

description.english: Accumulate 10,000 unspent skill points.
description.russian: Имейте 10000 неиспользованных очков навыка. [Accumulate 10,000 unspent skill points.]

description.english: Found a new toy.
description.russian: Найдите новую игрушку. [Found a new toy.]

description.english: Installed an augmentation at the first available opportunity.
description.russian: При первой же возможности установите приращение. [Installed an augmentation at the first available opportunity.]

description.english: Resisted the cult of the machine through to the bitter end.
description.russian: До самого конца сопротивляйтесь культу машин. [Resisted the cult of the machine through to the bitter end.]

displayName.russian: Моё тело улучшено [My Body is Augmented]

description.english: Fully upgrade an augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение. [Fully upgrade an augmentation.]

description.english: Fill every possible augmentation slot.
description.russian: Установите приращение в каждый слот. [Fill every possible augmentation slot.]

description.english: Fully upgrade four augmentations.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите четыре приращения. [Fully upgrade four augmentations.]

description.english: Install both the Cloak and Radar Transparency augmentations.
description.russian: Одновременно установите приращения 'Маскировка' (Cloak) и 'Невидимость для радара' (Radar Transparency). [Install both the Cloak and Radar Transparency augmentations.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the Microfibral Muscle augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Микрофибральные мышцы' (Microfibral Muscle). [Fully upgrade the Microfibral Muscle augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the Speed Enhancement augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Повышение скорости' (Speed Enhancement). [Fully upgrade the Speed Enhancement augmentation.]

displayName.english: All I Have is a Candy Bar
displayName.russian: Всё, что есть - это шоколадка [All I Have is a Candy Bar]

description.english: Find the hidden candy bar in the training level.
description.russian: Найдите спрятанную шоколадку во время тренировки. [Find the hidden candy bar in the training level.]

displayName.english: Don't Let It Go To Your Head
displayName.russian: Не бери в голову [Don't Let It Go To Your Head]

description.english: Find the secret location in the tutorial.
description.russian: Найдите секретную комнату во время тренировки. [Find the secret location in the tutorial.]

displayName.russian: Это что, арест? [AM I BEING DETAINED]

description.english: Reminded the NSF that UNATCO is a police force.
description.russian: Напомните NSF о том, что UNATCO - силы правопорядка. [Reminded the NSF that UNATCO is a police force.]

displayName.russian: Никакого уважения к властям [No Regard For Authority]

description.english: Obtain an assault rifle at the earliest possible opportunity.
description.russian: Как можно раньше заполучите штурмовую автоматическую винтовку. [Obtain an assault rifle at the earliest possible opportunity.]

description.english: You exercised restraint with Leo Gold.
description.russian: Вы проявили сдержанность в ситуации с Лео Голдом. [You exercised restraint with Leo Gold.]

description.english: You exercised your trigger finger with Leo Gold.
description.russian: Вы предпочли открыть огонь в ситуации с Лео Голдом. [You exercised your trigger finger with Leo Gold.]

description.english: This incident will be noted and logged, Agent.
description.russian: Инцидент с Лео Голдом будет доложен и расследован, агент. [This incident will be noted and logged, Agent.]

displayName.russian: Лает, но не кусает [All Bark, No Bite]

description.english: You took a fourth option.
description.russian: Вы выбрали четвертый вариант. [You took a fourth option.]

description.english: They didn't cover privacy at the academy.
description.russian: В академии ничего не рассказывали касательно права на неприкосновенность личной жизни. [They didn't cover privacy at the academy.]

description.english: Find a hidden crawlspace in UNATCO HQ
description.russian: Найдите потайное помещение в штаб-квартире UNATCO. [Find a hidden crawlspace in UNATCO HQ.]

description.english: You killed Shannon. What did she ever do to you?
description.russian: Вы убили Шеннон. Да что она такого вам сделала? [You killed Shannon. What did she ever do to you?]

description.english: Keep Sandra Renton out of danger.
description.russian: Помогите Сандре Рентон избежать опасности. [Keep Sandra Renton out of danger.]

displayName.english: What a Rotten Way to Die
displayName.russian: Какая нелепая смерть [What a Rotten Way to Die]

description.english: That's, uh, great.
description.russian: Ну просто... э-э-э... отлично. [That's, uh, great.]

description.english: Helped a man in a difficult situation.
description.russian: Помогите человеку в сложной ситуации. [Helped a man in a difficult situation.]

description.english: Read the secret to get into a hidden community
description.russian: Прочитайте о секрете, что позволит вам пробраться к тайной общине. [Read the secret to get into a hidden community]

description.english: Made JC laugh.
description.russian: Заставьте J.C. засмеяться. [Made JC laugh.]

description.english: Bought zyme from a drug dealer.
description.russian: Купите фермент у наркодилера. [Bought zyme from a drug dealer.]

description.english: You courteously spared the NSF.
description.russian: Вы великодушно пощадили NSF. [You courteously spared the NSF.]

description.english: Intrude on a private phone call.
description.russian: Подслушайте приватный телефонный разговор. [Intrude on a private phone call.]

displayName.russian: Игра в дартс [A Game of Darts]

description.english: Found a hidden cache.
description.russian: Найдите тайник. [Found a hidden cache.]

description.english: You made your brother genuinely angry.
description.russian: Серьезно разозлите своего брата. [You made your brother genuinely angry.]

description.english: Had a meaningful conversation with Juan Lebedev.
description.russian: Содержательно побеседуйте с Хуаном Лебедевым. [Had a meaningful conversation with Juan Lebedev.]

description.english: You did as you were told.
description.russian: Поступите так, как было приказано. [You did as you were told.]

displayName.russian: Глазом не моргнув [Didn't Blink an Eye]

description.english: You didn't blink. Neither did she.
description.russian: Вы даже не моргнули. Впрочем, как и она. [You didn't blink. Neither did she.]

displayName.english: Get the Hell Out of Here, Denton
displayName.russian: Проваливай отсюда, Дентон [Get the Hell Out of Here, Denton]

description.english: Did something you probably weren't supposed to do.
description.russian: Вы сделали нечто, что вероятно делать не следовало. [Did something you probably weren't supposed to do.]

description.english: Did something you really weren't supposed to do.
description.russian: Вы сделали нечто, что уж точно делать не следовало. [Did something you really weren't supposed to do.]

description.english: Went against protocol and armed a civilian.
description.russian: Действуйте вопреки протоколу и вооружите гражданского. [Went against protocol and armed a civilian.]

description.english: Assert to Paul that you are not a terrorist.
description.russian: Заявите Полу, что вы не террорист. [Assert to Paul that you are not a terrorist.]

description.english: Made it abundantly clear to UNATCO where your priorities lie.
description.russian: Очень доходчиво поясните UNATCO о своих приоритетах. [Made it abundantly clear to UNATCO where your priorities lie.]

description.english: Planned ahead for some unpleasant business.
description.russian: Распланируйте наперёд не самое приятное дело. [Planned ahead for some unpleasant business.]

description.english: Surrendered to Gunther in Battery Park.
description.russian: Сдайтесь Гюнтеру в Баттери Парк. [Surrendered to Gunther in Battery Park.]

description.english: Gave Gunther a fight in Battery Park.
description.russian: Дайте Гюнтеру бой в Баттери Парк. [Gave Gunther a fight in Battery Park.]

description.english: Self-sufficiency is an unwanted virtue.
description.russian: Самодостаточность - нежелаемое достоинство. [Self-sufficiency is an unwanted virtue.]

description.english: Against the odds, things turned out OK.
description.russian: Не смотря на трудности, дела наладились. [Against the odds, things turned out OK.]

description.english: Subverted your partner's expectations.
description.russian: Разрушьте ожидания вашего партнера. [Subverted your partner's expectations.]

description.english: Talk an agent to death.
description.russian: Заговорите агента до смерти. [Talk an agent to death.]

description.english: Neutralized Manderley, despite his best efforts.
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Мандерли, не смотря на его усилия. [Neutralized Manderley, despite his best efforts.]

description.english: You killed Manderley before he could get a word in.
description.russian: Убейте Мандерли прежде, чем он успеет сказать хоть что-то. [You killed Manderley before he could get word in.]

displayName.english: Places to Go, Things to Do
displayName.russian: Есть куда пойти, есть чем заняться [Places to Go, Things to Do]

description.english: You gave Manderley a chance to live.
description.russian: Дайте Мандерли шанс выжить. [You gave Manderley a chance to live.]

description.english: Discover the Thief at UNATCO.
description.russian: Найдите вора в UNATCO. [Discover the Thief at UNATCO.]

description.english: Helped a fellow prisoner.
description.russian: Помогите заключенному, собрату по несчастью. [Helped a fellow prisoner.]

description.english: You left it all behind.
description.russian: Вы оставили всё позади. [You left it all behind.]

description.english: Be free! Live! LIVE!
description.russian: Я дарю вам свободу! Живите! ЖИВИТЕ! [Be free! Live! LIVE!]

description.english: Vents can be useful.
description.russian: Вентиляционные шахты могут пригодится. [Vents can be useful.]

displayName.russian: Здесь не на что смотреть [Nothing to See Here]

description.english: Intruded on a police investigation.
description.russian: Вмешайтесь в полицейское расследование. [Intruded on a police investigation.]

description.english: Found an interesting piece of equipment.
description.russian: Вы нашли любопытный элемент снаряжения. [Found an interesting piece of equipment.]

displayName.russian: Истина редко бывает видна [Truth is Seldom Visible]

description.english: You have a suspicious mind, Agent.
description.russian: Вы склонны к подозрениям, Агент. [You have a suspicious mind, Agent.]

description.english: Paranoia can be addictive, Agent.
description.russian: К паранойе легко привыкнуть, Агент. [Paranoia can be addictive, Agent.]

description.english: Plundered the Canal Road Tunnel for rare treasure.
description.russian: Найдите сокровище в затопленной части Канал Роуд и присвойте его. [Plundered the Canal Road Tunnel for rare treasure.]

description.english: You killed Louis Pan.
description.russian: Убейте Луи Пена. [You killed Louis Pan.]

displayName.russian: На все руки мастер [Jack of All Trades]

description.english: A versatile agent is an unstoppable agent.
description.russian: Разносторонний агент неостановим. [A versatile agent is an unstoppable agent.]

description.english: You went for another option.
description.russian: Вы выбрали другой вариант. [You went for another option.]

description.english: What a Shame.
description.russian: Очень жаль. [What a Shame.]

description.english: You met up with old allies.
description.russian: Встретьтесь со старыми союзниками. [You met up with old allies.]

description.english: You destroyed the Versalife UC without collateral damage.
description.russian: Уничтожьте Универсальный Конструктор VersaLife, избежав ненужных жертв. [You destroyed the Versalife UC without collateral damage.]

description.english: You knocked out the door girl...poetically.
description.russian: Вы вырубили девочку у входа... поэтически. [You knocked out the door girl... poetically.]

displayName.english: The Anonymous Gangbanger of the 21st Century
displayName.russian: Анонимный злодей 21го столетия [The Anonymous Gangbanger of the 21st Century]

description.english: You must be some kind of standard.
description.russian: Вы как раз подходите под это описание. [You must be some kind of standard.]

description.english: Revisited an old secret.
description.russian: Загляните в старый тайник. [Revisited an old secret.]

description.english: Gave some advice to an entrepreneur.
description.russian: Дайте совет одному бизнесмену. [Gave some advice to an entrepreneur.]

description.english: Confronted an informant.
description.russian: Разоблачите информатора. [Confronted an informant.]

description.english: A crisp aftertaste with a hint of oak.
description.russian: Резкое послевкусие с дубовыми нотками. [A crisp aftertaste with a hint of oak.]

description.english: Reprogrammed all the bots at the Naval Shipyard.
description.russian: Перепрограммируйте всех роботов в морской верфи. [Reprogrammed all the bots at the Naval Shipyard.]

description.english: It might need a spin doctor.
description.russian: Им наверняка понадобится специалист по вентиляторам. [It might need a spin doctor.]

description.english: Sneak into the PRCS Wall Cloud without killing or knocking out anyone.
description.russian: Проберитесь на судно Wall Cloud, никого не убив и не оглушив.. [Sneak into the PRCS Wall Cloud without killing or knocking out anyone.]

description.english: Helped an ally.
description.russian: Помогите союзнику. [Helped an ally.]

displayName.russian: Взбрело в голову [Drug of the Mind]

description.english: The boldest measures are the safest.
description.russian: Самые жесткие меры - самые безопасные. [The boldest measures are the safest.]

description.english: Ventured in the deep unknown.
description.russian: Рискните спуститься в таинственные глубины. [Ventured in the deep unknown.]

description.english: Refilled the graveyard.
description.russian: Пополните кладбище телами. [Refilled the graveyard.]

description.english: Answered the phone.
description.russian: Ответьте на звонок телефона. [Answered the phone.]

description.english: What is privacy?
description.russian: Что есть личная жизнь? [What is privacy?]

description.english: Neutralized Agent Hela
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте Агента Хелу. [Neutralized Agent Hela]

displayName.russian: Ржавые кости на свалке [Rusty Bones in the Junkyard]

description.english: Used unconventional tactics against an old colleague.
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь нестандартной тактикой против бывшего коллеги. [Used unconventional tactics against an old colleague.]

description.english: Confront and report a petty mechanic.
description.russian: Поспорьте с механиком и донесите на него. [Confront and report a petty mechanic.]

description.english: Brought a message from mentor to pupil.
description.russian: Передайте ученику просьбу наставника. [Brought a message from mentor to pupil.]

description.english: Oh my god.
description.russian: О, Господи! [Oh my god.]

description.english: Made what was probably the ethical choice.
description.russian: Сделайте то, что было бы, возможно, милосердно. [Made what was probably the ethical choice.]

description.english: Listen to everything Morpheus has to say.
description.russian: Выслушайте всё, что может вам сказать Морфей. [Listen to everything Morpheus has to say.]

description.english: Confronted Everett and killed DeBeers.
description.russian: Поспорьте с Эвереттом и убейте ДеБирса. [Confronted Everett and killed DeBeers.]

displayName.russian: Хорошо быть снайпером [Snipin's a Good Job]

description.english: Death to all robots!
description.russian: Смерть всем роботам! [Death to all robots!]

description.english: Contaminated the Vandenberg tests with one of Page's subjects.
description.russian: Испортите опыты в Ванденберге при помощи одного из подчинённых Пейджа. [Contaminated the Vandenberg tests with one of Page's subjects.]

description.english: Reunite with an old acquaintance.
description.russian: Встретьтесь со старой знакомой. [Reunite with an old acquaintance.]

description.english: Saved a woman's life.
description.russian: Спасите жизнь женщины. [Saved a woman's life.]

description.english: Anna Navarre would be proud.
description.russian: Анна Наварре гордилась бы вами. [Anna Navarre would be proud.]

displayName.russian: Более продвинутая модель [The More Advanced Model]

description.english: Took another step forward.
description.russian: Сделайте ещё один шаг вперёд. [Took another step forward.]

description.english: Ambush your own ambush.
description.russian: Устройте засаду на засаду, что устроили на вас. [Ambush your own ambush.]

description.english: Ouch.
description.russian: Ой. [Ouch.]

description.english: Enter Page's bunker in tip-top shape.
description.russian: У вас всё должно быть тип-топ, как зайдете в бункер Пейджа. [Enter Page's bunker in tip-top shape.]

displayName.russian: Вопрос иного рода [Another Kind of Question]

description.english: Found yourself at a crossroads.
description.russian: Очутитесь на распутье. [Found yourself at a crossroads.]

description.english: Shut down every UC Page controls.
description.russian: Разберитесь с каждым Универсальным Конструктором, которые контролирует Пейдж. [Shut down every UC Page controls.]

displayName.russian: Да будет так начертано [So Let It Be Written]

description.english: So let it be done.
description.russian: Да будет так сделано. [So let it be done.]

description.english: You have no trouble mixing business with pleasure.
description.russian: Вы без проблем предаётесь удовольствию во время работы. [You have no trouble mixing business with pleasure.]

description.english: You might want to reconsider some of your life choices.
description.russian: Вам стоит пересмотреть свои жизненные приоритеты. [You might want to reconsider some of your life choices.]

displayName.russian: Гтов к исплнению обязнстей! [Reporting for Duty Free]

description.english: Malory, Manderley, close enough.
description.russian: Мандерли, вы так похожи на Мэлори Арчер... [Malory, Manderley, close enough.]

description.english: Now you found the secret code...
description.russian: Теперь вы нашли секретный код... [Now you found the secret code...]

description.english: Completed the game without using any multitools
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя мультиинструменты (multitools). [Completed the game without using any multitools]

description.english: Completed the game without using any lockpicks
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя отмычки (lockpicks). [Completed the game without using any lockpicks]

description.english: Completed the game without hacking any computers.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не взламывая компьютеры и терминалы. [Completed the game without hacking any computers.]

description.english: Used every wearable item at least once.
description.russian: Одновременно используйте все расходуемые приспособления. [Used every charged pickup at once.]

displayName.russian: И всё равно много навыков [But Still Overskilled]

description.english: Completed the game with all skills untrained.
description.russian: Пройдите игру с навыками на уровне 'Нетренирован' (Untrained). [Completed the game with all skills untrained.]

description.english: Fire!
description.russian: Огонь! [Fire!]

description.english: Smoke to death.
description.russian: Курите до тех пор, пока не умрёте. [Smoke to death.]

displayName.russian: Ничто меня не остановит [Nothing to Stop Me]

description.english: Completed the game on Realistic difficulty.
description.russian: Пройдите игру на уровне сложности Realistic (Реализм). [Completed the game on Realistic difficulty.]

description.english: Completed the game in Trenchcoat mode.
description.russian: Пройдите игру в режиме Trenchcoat. [Completed the game in Trenchcoat mode.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the Swimming skill and Aqualung augmentation.
description.russian: Установите приращение 'Акваланг' (Aqualung) и прокачайте навык плавания (swimming) до максимального уровня. [Fully upgrade the Swimming skill and Aqualung augmentation.]

displayName.russian: Покажи мне денежки [Show Me The Money]

description.english: Accumulate 10,000 credits.
description.russian: Накопите 10000 кредитов. [Accumulate 10,000 credits.]

description.english: Read one chapter from every book.
description.russian: Прочитайте любую главу из каждой доступной книги. [Read one chapter from every book.]

description.english: Disarm a LAM...unconventionally.
description.russian: Разберитесь с LAM... нестандартным способом. [Disarm a LAM...unconventionally.]

displayName.english: How Loyal is a Hungry Turret?
displayName.russian: Насколько лояльна голодная турель? [How Loyal is a Hungry Turret?]

description.english: Who's a good auto-targeting death machine?
description.russian: Кто у нас хорошая турелька? [Who's a good auto-targeting death machine?]

description.english: Make an enemy kill one of their own.
description.russian: Заставьте одного противника убить другого. [Make an enemy kill one of their own.]

description.english: Kill or knock out an enemy while camouflaged or cloaked.
description.russian: Убейте или вырубите противника, будучи замаскированным. [Kill or knock out an enemy while camouflaged or cloaked.]

description.english: Knock out a Commando.
description.russian: Оглушите Коммандоса MJ12. [Knock out a Commando.]

description.english: Knock out a Man In Black or Woman In Black.
description.russian: Оглушите Мужчину в черном или Женщину в черном. [Knock out a Man In Black or Woman In Black.]

description.english: Complete the game without killing any Grays, Greasels, or Karkians.
description.russian: Пройдите игру не убивая серых, гризелов, каркиан и их детенышей. [Complete the game without killing any Grays, Greasels, or Karkians.]

description.english: Not the kind you imagined.
description.russian: Вы представляли себе её несколько иной... [Not the kind you imagined.]

description.english: Destroy 3 giant spiderbots.
description.russian: Уничтожьте три гигантских паукобота. [Destroy 3 giant spiderbots.]

description.english: Use a scrambler grenade on a bot.
description.russian: Используйте кодовую гранату (scramble grenade) на любого робота. [Use a scrambler grenade on a bot.]

description.english: That wasn't meant for that.
description.russian: Её не планировалось использовать таким образом. [That wasn't meant for that.]

description.english: Destroy a Military Bot using a low tech weapon.
description.russian: Уничтожьте робота оружием ближнего боя. [Destroy a Military Bot using a low tech weapon.]

description.english: Eliminated an enemy from above. Really far above.
description.russian: Уничтожьте врага внизу, находясь наверху. Ну, совсем-совсем наверху. [Eliminated an enemy from above. Really far above.]

description.english: Make an enemy drop their weapons.
description.russian: Заставьте врага уронить своё оружие. [Make an enemy drop their weapons.]

description.english: Lose all four limbs and survive.
description.russian: Потерять все конечности и выжить. [Lose all four limbs and survive.]

description.english: Knock out a Gray with a baton.
description.russian: Вырубите дубинкой Серого. [Knock out a Gray with a baton.]

description.english: Make the most of a medical bot.
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь медицинским ботом по максимуму. [Make the most of a medical bot.]

displayName.russian: Ремонт электроники на скорую руку [Electronics Tinkerer]

description.english: Aggressively disable an alarm, camera, or laser system.
description.russian: Отключите камеру, панель звуковой сигнализации или лазерную систему в агрессивном стиле. [Aggressively disable an alarm, camera, or laser system.]

description.english: Destroy a camera, turret, or alarm panel using a sniper rifle or low tech weapon.
description.russian: Уничтожьте камеру, турель или панель сигнализации при помощи снайперской винтовки или меча. [Destroy a camera, turret, or alarm panel using a sniper rifle or low tech weapon.]

description.english: Fight the power.
description.russian: Сопротивляйтесь власти [Fight the power.]

description.english: What.
description.russian: Чего-чего??? [What.]

description.english: You wanted orange.
description.russian: Вам захотелось напитка со вкусом апельсина. [You wanted orange.]

description.english: Whacked a certain mole.
description.russian: Вы определенно убили крота. [Whacked a certain mole.]

description.english: Visit the UNATCO COM VAN at every opportunity.
description.russian: Посетите коммуникационный пункт UNATCO при каждой возможности. [Visit the UNATCO COM VAN at every opportunity.]

description.english: Evade Walton Simons at every opportunity.
description.russian: Ускользните от Уолтона Саймонса при каждой возможности [Evade Walton Simons at every opportunity.]

description.english: Shoot some hoops.
description.russian: Развлекитесь на площадке. [Shoot some hoops.]

description.english: Carry all of the non-disposable heavy weapons at once.
description.russian: Одновременно держите в инвентаре всё доступное многоразовое тяжелое оружие. [Carry all of the non-disposable heavy weapons at once.]

description.english: Carry the maximum number of multitools and lockpicks.
description.russian: Одновременно держите в инвентаре максимум мультиинструментов и отмычек. [Carry the maximum number of multitools and lockpicks.]

description.english: Carry the maximum number of medkits and biocells.
description.russian: Одновременно держите в инвентаре максимум аптечек и батарей. [Carry the maximum number of medkits and biocells.]

description.english: Carry every type of alcoholic drink at once.
description.russian: Одновременно держите в инвентаре все алкогольные напитки. [Carry every type of alcoholic drink at once.]

description.english: Eat, drink, and smoke one of everything.
description.russian: Съешьте, выпейте и выкурите всего как минимум по разу. [Eat, drink, and smoke one of everything.]

description.english: Crash, Clang, Boom.
description.russian: Трах, бах, бум! [Crash, Clang, Boom.]

displayName.russian: Забудь об этом, Дентон [Forget it, Denton]

description.english: Leave it behind.
description.russian: Оставь позади. [Leave it behind.]

description.english: Completed the game on Realistic difficulty with reduced inventory.
description.russian: Пройдите игру на сложности Realistic (Реализм) в режиме Trenchcoat. [Completed the game on Realistic difficulty with reduced inventory.]

description.english: Give a pilot what he wants.
description.russian: Дайте пилоту то, что он желает. [Give a pilot what he wants.]

description.english: Use your money in unethical ways.
description.russian: Воспользуйтесь своими деньгами неэтичным способом. [Use your money in unethical ways.]

description.english: Support clean energy
description.russian: Поддержите экологически чистые источники энергии. [Support clean energy]

description.english: No time to look deep into the conspiracies, just take them at face value!
description.russian: Нет времени погружаться в дебри заговоров, примем их за чистую монету! [No time to look deep into the conspiracies, just take them at face value!]

description.english: You have some interesting priorities, Agent.
description.russian: У вас любопытные приоритеты, Агент. [You have some interesting priorities, Agent.]

description.english: Crush someone or something to death.
description.russian: Раздавите кого-то или что-то насмерть. [Crush someone or something to death.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the aqualung augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Акваланг' (Aqualung).[Fully upgrade aqualung augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the ballistic protection augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Баллистическая защита' (Ballistic Protection). [Fully upgrade ballistic protection augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the cloak augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Маскировка' (Cloak). [Fully upgrade cloak augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the combat strength augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Боевая сила' (Combat Strength). [Fully upgrade combat strength augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the aggressive defensive system augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Агрессивная Система Защиты' (Aggressive Defense System). [Fully upgrade aggressive defensive system augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the spydrone augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Дрон-Шпион' (Spy Drone). [Fully upgrade the spydrone augmentation.]

displayName.russian: Мистер Фарадей, я полагаю? [Mr. Faraday, I Presume?]

description.english: Fully upgrade the EMP shield augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Э/м защита' (EMP Shield). [Fully upgrade the EMP shield augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the environmental resistance augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Устойчивость к среде' (Environmental Resistance). [Fully upgrade the environmental resistance augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the regeneration augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Регенерация' (Regeneration). [Fully upgrade reeneration augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the power re-circulator augmentation
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Рециркулятор энергии' (Power Recirculator). [Fully upgrade the power re-circulator augmentation]

description.english: Fully upgrade the radar transparency augmentation
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Невидимость для радара' (Radar Transparency). [Fully upgrade the radar transparency augmentation]

displayName.russian: Единый с элементами [One With The Elements]

description.english: Fully upgrade the energy shield augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Энергетическая защита' (Energy Shield). [Fully upgrade the energy shield augmentation.]

description.english: Fully upgrade the run silent augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Бесшумное движение' (Run Silent). [Fully upgrade the run silent augmentation.]

displayName.russian: У меня на прицеле [In My Sights]

description.english: Fully upgrade the targeting augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Нацеливание' (Targeting). [Fully upgrade the targeting augmentation.]

displayName.russian: Моё зрение улучшено [My Vision Is Augmented]

description.english: Fully upgrade the vision enhancement augmentation.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите приращение 'Улучшенное зрение' (Vision Enhancement). [Fully upgrade the vision enhancement augmentation.]

displayName.russian: Сфокусирован на главном задании [Primary Objective Focus]

description.english: Terrorists on my soil? Give me three minutes.
description.russian: Террористы на моей территории? Дайте мне три минуты. [Terrorists on my soil? Give me three minutes.]

displayName.russian: Практика ведёт к совершенству [Practice Makes Perfect]

description.english: Test your skills on the shooting range each time.
description.russian: Регулярно проверяйте свои навыки стрельбы. [Test your skills on the shooting range each time.]

description.english: I just wanted to see your skill...
description.russian: Я всего лишь хотел увидеть твои навыки воочию... [I just wanted to see your skill...]

displayName.russian: Теперь здесь я капитан! [I'm the Captain Now]

description.english: Look at me. LOOK AT ME.
description.russian: Глядите на меня. ГЛЯДИТЕ! [Look at me. LOOK AT ME.]

description.english: Bring the world into the new age violently.
description.russian: При помощи насилия введите этот мир в новую эру. [Bring the world into the new age violently.]

description.english: Became one with everything.
description.russian: Станьте единым со всем вокруг. [Became one with everything.]

description.english: The unseen battles are the most important.
description.russian: Битвы, коих не видно - самые важные [The unseen battles are the most important.]

description.english: A great use of precious time.
description.russian: Отлично используйте своё ценное время. [A great use of precious time.]

description.english: Test the theory of gravity with a test subject.
description.russian: Испытайте теорию гравитации на тестовом субъекте. [Test the theory of gravity with a test subject.]

description.english: Sliced and diced.
description.russian: Разделённое человечество. Разрубленное на куски. [Sliced and diced.]

description.english: Not the most ethical way to cook marshmallows.
description.russian: Не самый этичный способ приготовить мясцо на костре [Not the most ethical way to cook marshmallows.]

displayName.russian: Хорошее начало [Off to a Great Start]

description.english: Kill Private Winslow in training.
description.russian: Убить Кадета Винслоу во время тренировки. [Kill Private Winslow in training.]

description.english: Overcome great difficulty to deliver a cold pizza.
description.russian: Преодолейте все трудности и доставьте остывшую пиццу. [Overcome great difficulty to deliver a cold pizza.]

description.english: Tell people to educate themselves.
description.russian: Посоветуйте людям пойти учиться. [Tell people to educate themselves.]

description.english: Buy drugs, sell drugs.
description.russian: Покупайте наркотики, продавайте наркотики. [Buy drugs, sell drugs.]

displayName.russian: Оружие разных веков [Weapons Through the Ages]

description.english: Carry a sword from each era of man.
description.russian: Владейте мечом из каждой эры человечества. [Carry a sword from each era of man.]

description.english: Own a weapon with a scope, laser, and silencer.
description.russian: Владейте оружием с лазером, снайперским прицелом и глушителем. [Own a weapon with a scope, laser, and silencer.]

description.english: Finish the game without healing using a medical bot or recharging from a repair bot.
description.russian: Пройдите игру без лечения у медицинского бота и перезарядки энергии у ремонтного. [Finish the game without healing using a medical bot or recharging from a repair bot. ]

description.english: Finish the game with only a single, particular kill on your conscience.
description.russian: Пройдите игру лишь с одной определенной смертью на вашей совести. [Finish the game with only a single, particular kill on your conscience.]

displayName.russian: Я разлил свой напиток [I Spill My Drink]

description.english: Spilled your drink.
description.russian: Вы разлили свой напиток. [Spilled your drink.]

displayName.russian: Око за око [Eye for an Eye]

description.english: Killed an enemy as they killed you.
description.russian: Убейте противника в тот же момент, в который он убивает вас. [Killed an enemy as they killed you.]

description.english: Doo-do-do-do-doo.
description.russian: Та-да-да-да-да, та да... да-да-да... [Doo-do-do-do-doo.]

description.english: Have one robot destroy another.
description.russian: Заставьте одного робота уничтожить другого. [Have one robot destroy another.]

description.english: En garde!
description.russian: En garde!

description.english: Shoot plasma while dodging plasma.
description.russian: Выстрелите плазмой, при этом уворачиваясь от неё. [Shoot plasma while dodging plasma.]

description.english: Place yourself in the other side of an awkward conversation.
description.russian: Поставьте себя на другую сторону в этой неловкой беседе. [Place yourself in the other side of an awkward conversation.]

description.english: Terrorise the anti-terrorist coalition from within.
description.russian: Терроризируйте антитеррористическую организацию изнутри [Terrorise the anti-terrorist coalition from within.]

description.english: Buried your high-tech brother in an ancient tomb.
description.russian: Ваш высокотехнологичный брат похоронен в древнем склепе. [Buried your high-tech brother in an ancient tomb.]

description.english: Détruisez et tuez tout ce que vous voyez, y compris Michel, c'est une obligation.
description.russian: Détruisez et tuez tout ce que vous voyez, y compris Michel, c'est une obligation.

description.english: Continue to be too stubborn to learn and suffer real consequences.
description.russian: Вы не научились подозрительности, что повлекло тяжёлые последствия. [Continue to be too stubborn to learn and suffer real consequences.]

displayName.russian: Один особенный человек [The One Augmented Man]

description.english: Stole the one free crowbar.
description.russian: Украдите валяющуюся без дела монтировку. [Stole the one free crowbar.]

description.english: Locate the prototype assault heartgun.
description.russian: Найдите оружие-прототип Assault Heartgun [Locate the prototype assault heartgun.]

description.english: Modify a sawed-off shotgun to have 9 shells.
description.russian: Модифицируйте обрез (Sawed-off shotgun), чтобы в него помещалось 9 патронов. Modify a sawed-off shotgun to have 9 shells.

description.english: Carry a colourful collection of weapon modifications.
description.russian: Соберите разноцветую коллекцию модификаторов оружия. [Carry a colourful collection of weapon modifications.]

description.english: Successfully knock out Walton Simons.
description.russian: Успешно оглушите Уолтона Саймонса [Successfully knock out Walton Simons.]

description.english: Successfully disable a military bot using a PS20.
description.russian: Отключите военного робота при помощи PS20. [Successfully disable a military bot using a PS20.]

description.english: Crash a helicopter into an enemy in survival.
description.russian: Обрушьте вертолет на врагов в режиме Выживание [Crash a helicopter into an enemy in survival.]

displayName.russian: Не так быстро, J.C. [Not So Fast, J.C.]

description.english: Beat Liberty Island without talking to Paul.
description.russian: Разберитесь с проблемой на Острове Свободы, не поговорив с Полом. [Beat Liberty Island without talking to Paul.]

description.english: Kill a copy of yourself.
description.russian: Убейте свою копию. [Kill a copy of yourself.]

displayName.russian: Ты - полный кретин [You're a Complete Jackass]

description.english: Kill a certain person by dooming them to their fate, while they watch.
description.russian: На глазах у определенной персоны обреките её на верную смерть. [Kill a certain person by dooming them to their fate, while they watch.]

description.english: Have the perfect body for your host.
description.russian: Предстаньте перед процессом интеграции в идеальном состоянии. [Have the perfect body for your host.]

description.english: Upon arriving at the base, get the schematic from the Ocean Lab UC within 20 (real time) minutes.
description.russian: По прибытии на базу добудьте схемы из Океанической лаборатории за 20 минут реального времени. [Upon arriving at the base, get the schematic from the Ocean Lab UC within 20 (real time) minutes.]

description.english: Upon arriving at the dockyard, sink the ship and leave within 15 (real time) minutes.
description.russian: По прибытию в верфь затопите корабль и уберитесь с него за 15 минут реального времени. [Upon arriving at the dockyard, sink the ship and leave within 15 (real time) minutes.]

displayName.russian: Смерть в течение суток [Dead Within 24 Hours]

description.english: Upon starting the game, beat it within 24 real time hours.
description.russian: Пройдите игру за 24 часа реального времени [Upon starting the game, beat it within 24 real time hours.]

displayName.russian: Моё зрение слишком улучшено [My Vision is Too Augmented]

description.english: Gain 10 kills with the AimBot augmentation.
description.russian: Совершите 10 убийств при помощи приращения AimBot [Gain 10 kills with the AimBot augmentation.]

description.english: Grab a free soda or candy bar from a vending machine.
description.russian: Стащите из автомата бесплатную банку содовой или шоколадку. [Grab a free soda or candy bar from a vending machine.]

description.english: Complete the game without modifying a single weapon.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не модифицируя оружие. [Complete the game without modifying a single weapon.]

description.english: Complete the game without alerting a security camera.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не попадаясь на камеры наблюдения. [Complete the game without alerting a security camera.]

description.english: Deal with Adept 34501, but not lethally.
description.russian: Нелетально разберитесь с Адептом 34501. [Deal with Adept 34501, but not lethally.]

description.english: Kill a beggar.
description.russian: Убейте того, кто об этом просит. [Kill a beggar.]

displayName.russian: Самый тихий способ [The Most Silent Way]

description.english: Use the GEP gun take-down.
description.russian: Разберитесь с кое-кем при помощи ракетницы (GEP gun). [Use the GEP gun take-down.]

description.english: On any difficulty, find all 75 collectables in collectables mode.
description.russian: На любой сложности игры найдите все 75 коллекционных предметов в режиме игры 'Collectables Mode'. [On any difficulty, find all 75 collectables in collectables mode.]

description.english: Successfully knock out Gunther Hermann.
description.russian: Оглушите Гюнтера Херманна [Successfully knock out Gunther Hermann.]

description.english: Get noticed by the enemy while carrying a body.
description.russian: Вас заметили при переноске тела. [Get noticed by the enemy while carrying a body.]

description.english: Kill an enemy with their own rockets/grenades.
description.russian: Убейте врага его собственной ракетой или гранатой. [Kill an enemy with their own rockets/grenades.]

description.english: Use a big weapon on a big enemy.
description.russian: Используйте большую пушку против крупной органики. [Use a big weapon on a big organic enemy.]

description.english: Kill a sniper with your own sniper.
description.russian: Убейте снайпера из снайперской винтовки. [Kill a sniper with your own sniper.]

description.english: Kill an enemy with your grenade after you've already died.
description.russian: Убейте врага гранатой после того, как вы умерли. [Kill an enemy with your grenade after you've already died.]

description.english: Kill an enemy using a mini-crossbow with a mini-crossbow.
description.russian: Убейте арбалетчика из мини-арбалета. [Kill an enemy using a mini-crossbow with a mini-crossbow.]

description.english: Kill an enemy while highly drugged.
description.russian: Совершите убийство под кайфом. [Kill an enemy while highly drugged.]

description.english: Kill five enemies with a single 20mm HE grenade.
description.russian: Убейте 5 врагов одной 20мм гранатой (20mm HE Ammo). [Kill five enemies with a single 20mm HE grenade.]

displayName.russian: Последняя пуля, последний шанс [Last Bullet, Last Chance]

description.english: Kill someone using the very last bullet available for your weapon.
description.russian: Убейте кого-то последней имеющейся пулей. [Kill someone using the last bullet in your weapon.]

description.english: Beat the game without knocking out anyone.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, никого не оглушая. [Beat the game without knocking out anyone.]

description.english: Survive an attack due to the energy shield augmentation.
description.russian: Выживите во время атаки врага благодаря приращению 'Энергетическая защита' (Energy Shield). [Survive an attack due to the energy shield augmentation.]

description.english: Survive an attack due to the ballistic protection augmentation.
description.russian: Выживите во время атаки врага благодаря приращению 'Баллистическая защита' (Ballistic Protection). [Survive an attack due to the ballistic protection augmentation.]

description.english: Complete all Revision challenges on easy difficulty or above.
description.russian: Выполните все задачи на легкой сложности или выше. [Complete all Revision challenges on easy difficulty or above.]

description.english: Complete all Revision challenges on medium difficulty or above.
description.russian: Выполните все испытания на средней сложности или выше. [Complete all Revision challenges on medium difficulty or above.]

description.english: Complete all Revision challenges on hard difficulty or above.
description.russian: Пройдите все испытания на сложном уровне сложности или выше. [Complete all Revision challenges on hard difficulty or above.]

description.english: Complete all Revision challenges on realistic difficulty.
description.russian: Завершите все испытания на реалистичной сложности. [Complete all Revision challenges on realistic difficulty.]

description.english: Complete the game using a custom difficulty.
description.russian: Завершите игру, используя пользовательскую сложность. [Complete the game using a custom difficulty.]
